text: Agar munafiqeen, aur woh log jinke dilon mein kharabi hai, aur woh jo Medina mein hijaan angez afwahein(scandal mongers phaylane waley hain, apni harakaton se baaz na aayein to hum unke khilaf karawai karne ke liye tumhein utha khada karenge. Phir woh is shehar mein mushkil hi se tumhare saath reh sakenge)
